程序包 Service

类 PersonFinancialService.FinancialSummary

java.lang.Object
Service.PersonFinancialService.FinancialSummary
封闭类:
PersonFinancialService
public static class PersonFinancialService.FinancialSummary extends Object
Represents a financial summary, including total income, expenses, balance, and year-over-year changes.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    double
    getAccountBalance()
    Gets the overall account balance.
    double
    getExpenseChangeYear()
    Gets the percentage change in expenses from the previous year.
    double
    getIncomeChangeYear()
    Gets the percentage change in income from the previous year.
    double
    getTotalBalanceYear()
    Calculates the net balance for the selected year (income minus expenses).
    double
    getTotalExpenseYear()
    Gets the total expenses for the selected year.
    double
    getTotalIncomeYear()
    Gets the total income for the selected year.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • FinancialSummary

      public FinancialSummary(double totalIncomeYear, double totalExpenseYear, double accountBalance, double incomeChangeYear, double expenseChangeYear)
      Constructs a FinancialSummary instance with the specified financial metrics.
      参数:
      totalIncomeYear - the total income for the selected year
      totalExpenseYear - the total expenses for the selected year
      accountBalance - the overall account balance
      incomeChangeYear - the percentage change in income from the previous year
      expenseChangeYear - the percentage change in expenses from the previous year

  • 方法详细资料

    • getTotalIncomeYear

      public double getTotalIncomeYear()
      Gets the total income for the selected year.
      返回:
      the total income

    • getTotalExpenseYear

      public double getTotalExpenseYear()
      Gets the total expenses for the selected year.
      返回:
      the total expenses

    • getAccountBalance

      public double getAccountBalance()
      Gets the overall account balance.
      返回:
      the account balance

    • getIncomeChangeYear

      public double getIncomeChangeYear()
      Gets the percentage change in income from the previous year.
      返回:
      the income change percentage

    • getExpenseChangeYear

      public double getExpenseChangeYear()
      Gets the percentage change in expenses from the previous year.
      返回:
      the expense change percentage

    • getTotalBalanceYear

      public double getTotalBalanceYear()
      Calculates the net balance for the selected year (income minus expenses).
      返回:
